LightningComponentBundle.description: Adds Agent Assist Container UI Module to a Salesforce Record Page.

property.name: debugMode
property.label: Debug Mode
property.description: Enable debug logging to the browser console.

property.name: endpoint
property.label: UI Connector Endpoint
property.description: The URL of your UI Connector endpoint.

property.name: features
property.label: Features
property.description: Comma-separated list of Agent Assist features to enable (e.g., CONVERSATION_SUMMARIZATION,SMART_REPLY).

property.name: conversationProfile
property.label: Conversation Profile
property.description: The full resource name of the Conversation Profile.

property.name: channel
property.label: Channel
property.description: The type of conversation channel, either 'chat' or 'voice'.

property.name: platform
property.label: Platform
property.description: The Salesforce platform integration (e.g., messaging, twilioflex, servicecloudvoice-nice).

property.name: consumerKey
property.label: Connected App Consumer Key
property.description: The Consumer Key from your Salesforce Connected App for authentication.

property.name: consumerSecret
property.label: Connected App Consumer Secret
property.description: The Consumer Secret from your Salesforce Connected App for authentication.

property.name: containerHeight
property.label: Container Height
property.description: The height of the Agent Assist container (e.g. 710px).
